task_description: Fix SQLSTATE[23000]: Integrity constraint violation: 1062 Duplicate entry for key 'PRIMARY' during webhook operation.

current_step.name: logMessage modified
current_step.description: Modified logMessage method to use INSERT ... ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE for the messages table.

next_steps: Request user to trigger the error again
assumptions_made: The error occurs during a database insert operation related to bot IDs.
The 'id' column is the primary key in the 'messages' table, populated by update_id.
decisions_made: Use INSERT ... ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE for the messages table.
error_log: 2025-09-17 19:18:43 APP.ERROR: Generic Webhook Exception {"error":"SQLSTATE[23000]: Integrity constraint violation: 1062 Duplicate entry '844540264' for key 'PRIMARY'"}
